scan_linter_check.description: Avoid using hard-coded values in scripts, as they can lead to unpredictable results and can be difficult to track down later. Hard coding sys_ids is not recommended, as they may not be the same between instances.
scan_linter_check.name: Do not use hard-coded sys_ids
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Instead, try looking up a value by reference or by creating a property and retrieving the value with gs.getProperty().
